FlashBangEffect Class Reference

This class implements a full-screen filter that simulates the effect of a flash-bang grenade going off, and interrupting the player's vision. More...

#include <flash_bang_effect.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class implements a full-screen filter that simulates the effect of a flash-bang grenade going off, and interrupting the player's vision.
